original: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti?
analyzed: ▁ava ssu tāya ▁bhikkhuniyā ▁a vass ut assa ▁puris apuggal assa ▁kāya saṃ sagg aṃ ▁sādiy anti yā ▁āpattiyo ▁chann aṃ ▁āpatti samuṭṭhān ānaṃ ▁kati hi ▁ samuṭṭhān ehi ▁samu ṭṭh anti

original: Avassutāya bhikkhuniyā avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantiyā āpattiyo channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ ekena samuṭṭhānena samuṭṭhanti—
analyzed: ▁ava ssu tāya ▁bhikkhuniyā ▁a vass ut assa ▁puris apuggal assa ▁kāya saṃ sagg aṃ ▁sādiy anti yā ▁āpattiyo ▁chann aṃ ▁āpatti samuṭṭhān ānaṃ ▁ekena ▁ samuṭṭhān ena ▁samu ṭṭh anti

original: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato …pe….
Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti?
analyzed: ▁dad hi ṃ ▁viññāp etvā ▁bhuñjant iyā ▁āpattiyo ▁chann aṃ ▁āpatti samuṭṭhān ānaṃ ▁kati hi ▁ samuṭṭhān ehi ▁samu ṭṭh anti

original: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantiyā āpattiyo channaṁ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṁ catūhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhanti—
analyzed: ▁dad hi ṃ ▁viññāp etvā ▁bhuñjant iyā ▁āpattiyo ▁chann aṃ ▁āpatti samuṭṭhān ānaṃ ▁catūhi ▁ samuṭṭhān ehi ▁samu ṭṭh anti

original: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhanti, na vācato na cittato;
siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhanti, na cittato;
siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato;
siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.
